name: Alien Force
description:
Alien Force is an arcade game developed by Robert Epps. It came out on 01-01-1990. Robert Epps published the game.
Alien Force is available on PC.
It was produced by Donna Smith and Glen Murakami. It was scored by Kristopher Carter, Lolita Ritmanis, Michael McCuistion and Parry Gripp.
